about_the_game:
Hidden Valley TD is a tower defense with rogue-like elements offering many different strategies. Build towers, upgrade magic, and gather artifacts to see how long you can last against waves of undead minions! Enemies follow the path that you build or not build if you choose to wall them off completely.

Features:
  • Open pathing
  • Dozens of different artifacts to augment your strategy
  • Various towers, upgrades, research techs
  • Customize each tower attribute to fine tune your defense
  • Many enemy types and bosses ensuring no single master strategy
  • Large waves of enemies and dynamic enemy formations
  • Randomly generated map
